item.title: Ethics: My Direct Report and Friend Wants PTO When We’re Understaffed. What Should I Say?
item.description: A leader has to walk the line between boss and friend in this week’s Ethics column.

item.title: Cybersecurity Experts Warn That This Browser Extension Is Selling Your Chats With ChatGPT
item.description: A cybersecurity company claims that this popular VPN is “harvesting” AI chats.

item.title: Michael Burry Is Challenging Nvidia’s Jensen Huang Again
item.description: He called for help from his followers to confirm the CEO’s claims.

item.title: The New York Times Wants You to Feel Sorry for the Coldplay HR Executive. HR Professionals Can’t
item.description: Human resources leaders need to hold themselves to consistent high standards, and that’s why the kiss cam couple is no longer working for Astronomer.

item.title: The Real Reason No One Sees Your Marketing
item.description: And 3 Simple Fixes that Have Helped 127,785 Other Businesses
